effect.en: At any time between turns, if the Pokémon Miracle Berry is attached to is Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned, you may remove all those effects from that Pokémon and discard Miracle Berry. At the start of each turn, if the Pokémon Miracle Berry is attached to is Asleep, Confused, Paralyzed, or Poisoned, remove all of those effects from that Pokémon and discard Miracle Berry.
